goal: Book a room at Lensfield hotel
context: The user is planning a weekend getaway to Cambridge and wants to book a room at Lensfield hotel for a comfortable stay.

That sounds like a great plan for your weekend trip to Cambridge! Let me check the availability of a standard double room at Lensfield hotel for you. I'll get back to you with the details shortly.

Could you please provide the booking details for the standard double room at Lensfield hotel?
Certainly! Your booking details for the standard double room at Lensfield hotel will be sent to you shortly. Thank you for your patience!
